section:
A long wooden bridge supported by heavy wooden pilings stretches across the Chu River. A woman in warrior’s garb awaits you at the halfway point, announcing herself as the daughter of Lord Chudaifu of the Black Swan Clan. Apparently she wishes to test her martial prowess against you - she has drawn her sword and stepped out to block your path.
Accept her challenge Go back the way you came
Show her an agate swan if you have one
